ayahs.textUthmani: وَلَقَدْ جَعَلْنَا فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ بُرُوجًا وَزَيَّنَّـٰهَا لِلنَّـٰظِرِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَلَقَدْ [And verily] جَعَلْنَا [We have placed] فِى [in] ٱلسَّمَآءِ [the heavens] بُرُوجًۭا [constellations] وَزَيَّنَّـٰهَا [and We have beautified it] لِلنَّـٰظِرِينَ [for the observers]
ayahs.transliteration: Walaqad jaAAalna fee assama-iburoojan wazayyannaha linnathireen

ayahs.wordByWord: وَحَفِظْنَـٰهَا [And We have protected it] مِن [from] كُلِّ [every] شَيْطَـٰنٍۢ [devil] رَّجِيمٍ [accursed]

ayahs.textUthmani: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱسْتَرَقَ ٱلسَّمْعَ فَأَتْبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٌ مُّبِينٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: إِلَّا [Except] مَنِ [(one) who] ٱسْتَرَقَ [steals] ٱلسَّمْعَ [the hearing] فَأَتْبَعَهُۥ [then follows him] شِهَابٌۭ [a burning flame] مُّبِينٌۭ [clear]
ayahs.transliteration: Illa mani istaraqa assamAAafaatbaAAahu shihabun mubeen

ayahs.textUthmani: وَٱلْأَرْضَ مَدَدْنَـٰهَا وَأَلْقَيْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ وَأَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ مَّوْزُونٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَٱلْأَرْضَ [And the earth] مَدَدْنَـٰهَا [We have spread it] وَأَلْقَيْنَا [and [We] cast] فِيهَا [therein] رَوَٰسِىَ [firm mountains] وَأَنۢبَتْنَا [and [We] caused to grow] فِيهَا [therein] مِن [of] كُلِّ [every] شَىْءٍۢ [thing] مَّوْزُونٍۢ [well-balanced]
ayahs.transliteration: Wal-arda madadnahawaalqayna feeha rawasiya waanbatnafeeha min kulli shay-in mawzoon

ayahs.textUthmani: وَجَعَلْنَا لَكُمْ فِيهَا مَعَـٰيِشَ وَمَن لَّسْتُمْ لَهُۥ بِرَٰزِقِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَجَعَلْنَا [And We have made] لَكُمْ [for you] فِيهَا [therein] مَعَـٰيِشَ [means of living] وَمَن [and whom] لَّسْتُمْ [you are not] لَهُۥ [for him] بِرَٰزِقِينَ [providers]
ayahs.transliteration: WajaAAalna lakum feeha maAAayishawaman lastum lahu biraziqeen

ayahs.textUthmani: وَإِن مِّن شَىْءٍ إِلَّا عِندَنَا خَزَآئِنُهُۥ وَمَا نُنَزِّلُهُۥٓ إِلَّا بِقَدَرٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَإِن [And not] مِّن [(is) any] شَىْءٍ [thing] إِلَّا [but] عِندَنَا [with Us] خَزَآئِنُهُۥ [(are) its treasures] وَمَا [and not] نُنَزِّلُهُۥٓ [We send it down] إِلَّا [except] بِقَدَرٍۢ [in a measure] مَّعْلُومٍۢ [known]
ayahs.transliteration: Wa-in min shay-in illa AAindanakhaza-inuhu wama nunazziluhu illa biqadarinmaAAloom

ayahs.textUthmani: وَأَرْسَلْنَا ٱلرِّيَـٰحَ لَوَٰقِحَ فَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَأَسْقَيْنَـٰكُمُوهُ وَمَآ أَنتُمْ لَهُۥ بِخَـٰزِنِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَأَرْسَلْنَا [And We have sent] ٱلرِّيَـٰحَ [the winds] لَوَٰقِحَ [fertilizing] فَأَنزَلْنَا [and We sent down] مِنَ [from] ٱلسَّمَآءِ [the sky] مَآءًۭ [water] فَأَسْقَيْنَـٰكُمُوهُ [and We gave it to you to drink] وَمَآ [And not] أَنتُمْ [you] لَهُۥ [of it] بِخَـٰزِنِينَ [(are) retainers]
ayahs.transliteration: Waarsalna arriyaha lawaqihafaanzalna mina assama-i maanfaasqaynakumoohu wama antum lahu bikhazineen

words.translation: and We gave it to you to drink

ayahs.textUthmani: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ نُحْىِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَنَحْنُ ٱلْوَٰرِثُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَإِنَّا [And indeed, We] لَنَحْنُ [surely [We]] نُحْىِۦ [We give life] وَنُمِيتُ [and We cause death] وَنَحْنُ [and We] ٱلْوَٰرِثُونَ [(are) the Inheritors]

ayahs.textUthmani: وَلَقَدْ عَلِمْنَا ٱلْمُسْتَقْدِمِينَ مِنكُمْ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمْنَا ٱلْمُسْتَـْٔخِرِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَلَقَدْ [And verily] عَلِمْنَا [We know] ٱلْمُسْتَقْدِمِينَ [the preceding ones] مِنكُمْ [among you] وَلَقَدْ [and verily] عَلِمْنَا [We know] ٱلْمُسْتَـْٔخِرِينَ [the later ones]
ayahs.transliteration: Walaqad AAalimna almustaqdimeenaminkum walaqad AAalimna almusta/khireen

ayahs.textUthmani: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ يَحْشُرُهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ حَكِيمٌ عَلِيمٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَإِنَّ [And indeed] رَبَّكَ [your Lord] هُوَ [He] يَحْشُرُهُمْ ۚ [will gather them] إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, He] حَكِيمٌ [(is) All-Wise] عَلِيمٌۭ [All-Knowing]
ayahs.transliteration: Wa-inna rabbaka huwa yahshuruhuminnahu hakeemun AAaleem

ayahs.textUthmani: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِن صَلْصَـٰلٍ مِّنْ حَمَإٍ مَّسْنُونٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَلَقَدْ [And verily] خَلَقْنَا [We created] ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ [humankind] مِن [(out) of] صَلْصَـٰلٍۢ [sounding clay] مِّنْ [from] حَمَإٍۢ [black mud] مَّسْنُونٍۢ [altered]
ayahs.transliteration: Walaqad khalaqna al-insana minsalsalin min hama-in masnoon

ayahs.textUthmani: وَٱلْجَآنَّ خَلَقْنَـٰهُ مِن قَبْلُ مِن نَّارِ ٱلسَّمُومِ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَٱلْجَآنَّ [And the jinn] خَلَقْنَـٰهُ [We created it] مِن [before] قَبْلُ [before] مِن [from] نَّارِ [fire] ٱلسَّمُومِ [scorching]
ayahs.transliteration: Waljanna khalaqnahumin qablu min nari assamoom

ayahs.textUthmani: وَإِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّى خَـٰلِقٌۢ بَشَرًا مِّن صَلْصَـٰلٍ مِّنْ حَمَإٍ مَّسْنُونٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَإِذْ [And when] قَالَ [your Lord said] رَبُّكَ [your Lord said] لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ [to the Angels] إِنِّى [Indeed, I] خَـٰلِقٌۢ [(will) create] بَشَرًۭا [a human being] مِّن [(out) of] صَلْصَـٰلٍۢ [clay] مِّنْ [from] حَمَإٍۢ [black mud] مَّسْنُونٍۢ [altered]
ayahs.transliteration: Wa-ith qala rabbuka lilmala-ikatiinnee khaliqun basharan min salsalin min hama-inmasnoon

ayahs.textUthmani: فَإِذَا سَوَّيْتُهُۥ وَنَفَخْتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِى فَقَعُوا۟ لَهُۥ سَـٰجِدِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَإِذَا [So, when] سَوَّيْتُهُۥ [I have fashioned him] وَنَفَخْتُ [and [I] breathed] فِيهِ [into him] مِن [of] رُّوحِى [My spirit] فَقَعُوا۟ [then fall down] لَهُۥ [to him] سَـٰجِدِينَ [prostrating]
ayahs.transliteration: Fa-itha sawwaytuhu wanafakhtu feehimin roohee faqaAAoo lahu sajideen

ayahs.wordByWord: فَسَجَدَ [So prostrated] ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ [the Angels] كُلُّهُمْ [all of them] أَجْمَعُونَ [together]

ayahs.textUthmani: إِلَّآ إِبْلِيسَ أَبَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: إِلَّآ [Except] إِبْلِيسَ [Iblis] أَبَىٰٓ [He refused] أَن [to] يَكُونَ [be] مَعَ [with] ٱلسَّـٰجِدِينَ [those who prostrated]
ayahs.transliteration: Illa ibleesa aba an yakoonamaAAa assajideen
